00027 void ActiveViewModel::setDesign( DesignWidget* designWidget, 
00028                                                                 QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration> desConf) {
00029         Q_ASSERT(designWidget);
00030 
00031         // remove the previous instances and disconnect their signals
00032         clear();
00033 
00034         designWidget_ = designWidget;
00035 
00036         editProvider_ = designWidget->getGenericEditProvider();
00037 
00038         desConf_ = desConf;
00039         // if design configuration is not used.
00040         if (!desConf_) {
00041 
00042                 return;
00043         }
00044 
00045         beginResetModel();
00046 
00047         // get the instances
00048         instances_ = designWidget->getInstances();
00049         for (int i = 0; i < instances_.size(); ++i) {
00050                 
00051                 const QString instanceName = instances_.at(i)->name();
00052 
00053                 // if theres a defined active view for the instance.
00054                 if (desConf_->hasActiveView(instanceName)) {
00055                         table_.append(InstanceViewPair(instanceName, desConf_->getActiveView(instanceName)));
00056                 }
00057                 // if no active view has been defined.
00058                 else {
00059                         table_.append(InstanceViewPair(instanceName));
00060                 }
00061 
00062                 connect(instances_.at(i), SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&, const QString&)),
00063                         this, SLOT(renameInstance(const QString&, const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00064                 connect(instances_.at(i), SIGNAL(destroyed(DiagramComponent*)),
00065                         this, SLOT(removeInstance(DiagramComponent*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00066         }
00067 
00068         endResetModel();
00069 
00070         connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(DiagramComponent*)),
00071                 this, SLOT(addInstance(DiagramComponent*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00072         connect(designWidget, SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(DiagramComponent*)),
00073                 this, SLOT(removeInstance(DiagramComponent*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00074 }
00075 
00076 void ActiveViewModel::clear() {
00077 
00078         // if previous design widget has been set then disconnect it
00079         if (designWidget_) {
00080                 designWidget_->disconnect(this);
00081                 designWidget_ = 0;
00082         }
00083 
00084         // disconnect all component instances and clear the list
00085         foreach(DiagramComponent* diaComp, instances_) {
00086                 diaComp->disconnect(this);
00087         }
00088         instances_.clear();
00089 
00090         // clear the pointers
00091         desConf_.clear();
00092         editProvider_.clear();
00093 
00094         beginResetModel();
00095         table_.clear();
00096         endResetModel();
00097 }

00099 int ActiveViewModel::rowCount(const QModelIndex& parent /*= QModelIndex()*/ ) const {
00100         if (parent.isValid())
00101                 return 0;
00102         return table_.size();
00103 }

00105 int ActiveViewModel::columnCount(const QModelIndex& parent /*= QModelIndex()*/ ) const {
00106         if (parent.isValid())
00107                 return 0;
00108         return 2;
00109 }

00111 QVariant ActiveViewModel::data(const QModelIndex& index, int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole*/ ) const {
00112         if (!index.isValid())
00113                 return QVariant();
00114         else if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00115                 return QVariant();
00116 
00117         if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00118 
00119                 switch (index.column()) {
00120                         case 0: {
00121                                 return table_.at(index.row()).instanceName_;
00122                                         }
00123                         case 1: {
00124                                 return table_.at(index.row()).viewName_;
00125                                         }
00126                         default:
00127                                 return QVariant();
00128                 }
00129         }
00130         else if (role == Qt::UserRole) {
00131                 // if the possible view names are requested.
00132                 if (index.column() == 1) {
00133                         
00134                         // search the diagram component that matches the asked instance name.
00135                         DiagramComponent* searched = 0;
00136                         foreach (DiagramComponent* diaComp, instances_) {
00137                                 // if instance name matches
00138                                 if (diaComp->name() == table_.at(index.row()).instanceName_) {
00139                                         searched = diaComp;
00140                                         break;
00141                                 }
00142                         }
00143                         Q_ASSERT(searched);
00144 
00145                         // return the views the component model contains.
00146                         return searched->componentModel()->getViewNames();
00147                 }
00148                 else
00149                         return QVariant();
00150         }
00151         // is unsupported role
00152         else
00153                 return QVariant();
00154 }

00156 bool ActiveViewModel::setData(const QModelIndex& index, const QVariant& value,
00157                                                           int role /*= Qt::EditRole*/ ) {
00158                                                                  
00159         if (!index.isValid())
00160                 return false;
00161         else if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00162                 return false;
00163 
00164         if (role == Qt::EditRole) {
00165         
00166                 switch (index.column()) {
00167                         // only the view name can be changed
00168                         case 1: {       
00169 
00170                                 // create a command to the undo stack
00171                                 QSharedPointer<ComponentActiveViewChangeCommand> command = QSharedPointer<ComponentActiveViewChangeCommand>(
00172                                         new ComponentActiveViewChangeCommand(
00173                                         table_[index.row()].instanceName_, table_[index.row()].viewName_, value.toString(), this));
00174                                 editProvider_->addCommand(command, false);
00175 
00176                                 // make the change
00177                                 table_[index.row()].viewName_ = value.toString();
00178 
00179                                 // save the new active view to the design configuration
00180                                 desConf_->addViewConfiguration(table_.at(index.row()).instanceName_,
00181                                         table_.at(index.row()).viewName_);
00182                                 emit dataChanged(index, index);
00183                                 return true;
00184                                         }
00185                         default:
00186                                 return false;
00187                 }
00188         }
00189         else
00190                 return false;
00191 }

00193 QVariant ActiveViewModel::headerData(int section, Qt::Orientation orientation,
00194                                                                          int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole*/ ) const {
00195 
00196         if (role != Qt::DisplayRole)
00197                 return QVariant();
00198         else if (section < 0)
00199                 return QVariant();
00200         else if (orientation != Qt::Horizontal)
00201                 return QVariant();
00202 
00203         if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00204                 switch (section) {
00205                    case 0: {
00206                            return tr("Instance name");
00207                                    }
00208                    case 1: {
00209                            return tr("Active view");
00210                                    }
00211                    default: {
00212                            return QVariant();
00213                                         }
00214                 }
00215         }
00216         // if unsupported role
00217         else
00218                 return QVariant();
00219 }

00221 Qt::ItemFlags ActiveViewModel::flags(const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00222         if (!index.isValid())
00223                 return Qt::NoItemFlags;
00224 
00225         // the instance name can not be edited.
00226         else if (index.column() == 0)
00227                 return Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable;
00228 
00229         // active view can be edited.
00230         else
00231                 return Qt::ItemIsEditable | Qt::ItemIsSelectable | Qt::ItemIsEnabled;
00232 }

00234 void ActiveViewModel::renameInstance(const QString& newName,  const QString& oldName) {
00235 
00236         InstanceViewPair newItem(oldName);
00237         
00238         // if instance with same name is not found
00239         if (!table_.contains(newItem))
00240                 return;
00241         else {
00242                 // find the row of the named instance
00243                 int row = table_.indexOf(newItem);
00244                 
00245                 // remove the configuration for the old name
00246                 desConf_->removeViewConfiguration(table_[row].instanceName_);
00247 
00248                 // rename the instance
00249                 table_[row].instanceName_ = newName;
00250 
00251                 // save the new active view to the design configuration
00252                 desConf_->addViewConfiguration(table_.at(row).instanceName_,
00253                         table_.at(row).viewName_);
00254 
00255                 // inform views that data has changed
00256                 QModelIndex modelIndex = QAbstractTableModel::index(row, 0, QModelIndex());
00257                 emit dataChanged(modelIndex, modelIndex);
00258         }
00259 }
00260 
00261 void ActiveViewModel::removeInstance( DiagramComponent* diaComp ) {
00262 
00263         if (diaComp) {
00264                 InstanceViewPair itemToRemove(diaComp->name());
00265                 
00266                 // if item is found on the table
00267                 if (table_.contains(itemToRemove)) {
00268                         int row = table_.indexOf(itemToRemove);
00269                         
00270                         // remove the item from the table
00271                         beginRemoveRows(QModelIndex(), row, row);
00272                         table_.removeAt(row);
00273                         endRemoveRows();
00274                 }
00275 
00276                 if (instances_.contains(diaComp)) 
00277                         instances_.removeAll(diaComp);
00278                 
00279                 // remove the connections between the diagram component and this model.
00280                 diaComp->disconnect(this);
00281         }
00282 }
00283 
00284 void ActiveViewModel::addInstance( DiagramComponent* diaComp ) {
00285 
00286         // if instance is already in the model
00287         if (instances_.contains(diaComp))
00288                 return;
00289 
00290         // add the pointer to the component instance
00291         instances_.append(diaComp);
00292 
00293         // add the item to the model to be displayed
00294         InstanceViewPair newItem(diaComp->name());
00295         beginInsertRows(QModelIndex(), table_.size(), table_.size());
00296         table_.append(newItem);
00297         endInsertRows();
00298 
00299         connect(diaComp, SIGNAL(destroyed(DiagramComponent*)),
00300                 this, SLOT(removeInstance(DiagramComponent*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00301         connect(diaComp, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&, const QString&)),
00302                 this, SLOT(renameInstance(const QString&, const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00303 }
00304 
00305 void ActiveViewModel::setActiveView( const QString& instanceName, const QString& viewName ) {
00306         // search all component instances
00307         for (int i = 0; i < table_.size(); ++i) {
00308                 
00309                 // if instance is found
00310                 if (table_.at(i).instanceName_ == instanceName) {
00311 
00312                         // update the view name on the screen
00313                         beginResetModel();
00314                         table_[i].viewName_ = viewName;
00315                         endResetModel();
00316         
00317                         // update the design configuration
00318                         if (desConf_)
00319                                 desConf_->addViewConfiguration(instanceName, viewName);
00320 
00321                         return;
00322                 }
00323         }
00324 }

00326 bool ActiveViewModel::hasConfiguration() const {
00327         // if design configuration exists 
00328         if (desConf_)
00329                 return true;
00330         return false;
00331 }

00345 bool ActiveViewModel::InstanceViewPair::operator==(const InstanceViewPair& other ) {
00346         return instanceName_ == other.instanceName_;
00347 }

00349 bool ActiveViewModel::InstanceViewPair::operator!=(const InstanceViewPair& other ) {
